price: atëherë ti, o njeri, që përpiqesh shumë, mundin tënd do ta gjesh te Zoti yt.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
